sentences.en: "He deserved to die," said Penelope viciously.
sentences.cn: “他该去死，”佩内洛普恶毒地说道。

sentences.en: "That was a truly delicious piece of pork," he said. "Yes, wasn't it?" echoed Penelope.
sentences.cn: “那块猪肉真好吃，”他说。“没错，可不是么？”佩内洛普附和道。

sentences.en: But then one day, a very special young man arrives and teaches Penelope to enjoy life.
sentences.cn: 但是接着有一天, 一位非常特别的年轻人来到此地,并且教导潘妮洛普要享受生活.

sentences.en: Johnny Depp : Expect Zombies, Mermaids & Penelope Cruz in Pirates 4!
sentences.cn: 加勒比海盗4看什么?僵尸 、 美人鱼 和 佩内洛普克鲁兹!

sentences.en: Matthew McConaughey and Penelope Cruz enjoy love on the rocks at a seaside villa Mexico.
sentences.cn: 马修·麦康纳和佩内洛普·克鲁兹在墨西哥海滨别墅的岩石上享受阳光.

sentences.en: Mr Jones made a long speech at the meeting. Everyone else thought it a Penelope's web.
sentences.cn: 琼斯先生在会上的讲话, 给人一种永无休止的感觉,很冗长.

sentences.en: Penelope came forward and embraced her sister.
sentences.cn: 佩内洛普走上前拥抱了她妹妹。

sentences.en: Penelope Cruz Full video with a naked celebrity!
sentences.cn: 裸露名人潘妮洛普克鲁兹完整影片!

sentences.en: Penelope mentioned his request through the door.
sentences.cn: 潘尼洛甫隔着门,把他的要求向里面通报了一下.

sentences.en: They were insolent and overbearing to the servants and friends of Penelope.
sentences.cn: 他们对待佩内洛普的仆人和朋友傲慢无礼.

sentences.en: This unfortunate aristocrat girl Penelope becomes this ancient curse fall guy.
sentences.cn: 这个不幸的贵族女孩佩内洛普成为这个古老诅咒的牺牲者.

sentences.en: When did you last see Penelope?
sentences.cn: 你最近一次是什么时候看到佩内洛普的?

phrases.tran_cn: 佩内洛普·克鲁兹（西班牙女影星）

trans.tran_cn: <希神>珀涅罗珀，Odysseus的忠实妻子，丈夫远征20年，期间她拒绝了无数求婚者
珀涅罗珀（Odysseus 的忠实妻子）
trans.tran_en: the wife of Odysseus, who remained true to him during his long absence despite the importunities of many suitors
